alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 8:33PM CDT until April 16 at 2:12PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94). * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday to a crest of 18.5 feet Thursday. It will then fall below flood stage Friday. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
